mapper.sql: id, user_name, pass_word, age, address, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into per_user (id, user_name, pass_word, age, address, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

age,
address,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update per_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pass_word = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
